entities.name: people
entities.description: Refers to a large group of individuals from various places.

entities.name: foreigners
entities.description: Specifically mentions people who are not from the same country or region.

entities.name: weirdos
entities.description: Describes a group of individuals who stand out due to their unusual behavior or appearance.

entities.name: bloke
entities.description: Refers to a man wearing a kilt and poncho, described as unusual.

entities.name: mr roberts
entities.description: Has a front door where a wizard appears next to it.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: Appears out of thin air and casts a spell on Mr. Roberts.

relationships.description: The wizard points his wand at Mr. Roberts, causing him to lose focus.
The wizard's spell is directed towards Mr. Roberts.
